#summary How to structure the differenct closure tools.

= Introduction =

If you read the other Wiki-Pages about how to get a small script size, you have to set up your closure tools. Here is a tutorial.


= Tutorial =

I made this tutorial for Ubuntu-Users.

{{{
sudo apt-get install ant openjdk-6-jre-headless openjdk-6-jre-lib wget subversion unzip

cd /var/www
mkdir closure
cd closure
svn checkout http://closure-library.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ closure-library

wget http://closure-compiler.googlecode.com/files/compiler-latest.zip
unzip compiler-latest.zip
}}}
